about_the_game:
Chloe the Cat is collectathon precision platformer where you play as Chloe, a black tortoiseshell cat. On her adventure, Chloe encounters gargantuan grapes, dodges dangerous spikes, and chases after mischievous mice.

Collect coins and food, buy hats to show off to all your friends, and persevere through the toughest of platforming challenges. Explore the first 2 levels and a portion of the overworld, and continue right where you left off in the full version.

Features

  • Explore 2 levels and a hub world set in colorful sprawling environments

  • Collect over 40+ food cans scattered around every kitty-corner

  • Customize your look by donning a variety of hats and accessories

  • Purrfect your skills by racing against the clock with timed runs

  • Play your way with accessibility options to go at your own pace

  • Carry over all progess you made in the demo to the full version

Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

As Chloe, you can jump off the ground and leap from walls, claw away enemies in a spinning frenzy, and pounce to quickly boost forward. Combine these 3 simple moves with tight controls to navigate treacherous obstacles and explore to your heart's content.

Collect 'Em All

Gather coins to purchase a wide selection of hats to express yourself. Stake out at flags to use as checkpoints scattered throughout the land. Find food cans in hard-to-reach places and where you'd least expect.

Practice Makes Purrfect

With frequent checkpoints and much more than 9 lives, no challenge is impawssible. You'll quickly learn from your mistakes and find yourself breezing past challenges you were hopelessly stuck at before.

Shoot for a New Record

For speedrunning experts, sprint to the finish line and shoot for a new personal best practicing your fastest techniques. Or slow down and tread carefully, navigating through each level unscathed for Chloe's sake.

Fun for All

Having a bit of trouble, or just want to save Chloe from despair? Ease the pain with accessibility options so anyone can enjoy, whether you're brand new to gaming or a platforming veteran.

name: Chloe the Cat Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Jump, swipe, and pounce your way through this colorful platforming adventure as Chloe the Cat! Explore each nook and cranny for food and secrets while leaping past danger around every corner.
